channel.title: Testing on Najam Sikander Awan
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on Najam Sikander Awan

item.title: Testing jQuery code via YUI Test
item.description: The term TDD is not new to me I heard it quite often but never took time to go into details until last few days. I have been checking stuff from YUI team and liked their YUI test framework for now ,but in future i might switch to qUint (jquery testing framework) as I am big fan of jQuery and using it daily. There are different version of YUI like 2.
